__e: "Wouldn't it be great if we never had to go back?"
Well, I am not sitting home again watching lacrosse videos, so if the four of us are hanging out, we are doing something fun.
Tell me, if we were to go out one evening amongst the common people, which of you, our family, would guide us? You would need protection, Father.
If we don't succeed, then we will have tried.
See, this is the kind of shit I'm afraid of happening if Kev and I have a kid or two.
If we get into any trouble, all we have to do is pull the pin.
And even if we don't make it, someday, people will know what we did out here.
Oh no, what if we have to finish the whole journey without him? !
To show him and everybody else what would happen if they did anything to help a... A crazy fool... Who walked into our neighborhood with no idea what it took for us to stay alive.
You say that like we shouldn't be friends.
We thought we should be here through it all.
It's like we should be different, but we're both focused on the same thing.

You know, it's just frustrating, because you weren't, like, honest or straightforward with me about it, and so I didn't even get the chance to, like, look for other opportunities if this falls through, you know?
If we fail, if our mission is unsuccessful... many more dead will follow.
If I don't see you later.. Thank you for your service.
If we never see each other again, there's just one thing I need you to do for me.
It's not like we're never going to see each other, right?
